body.name: Steamer Iron for Clothes 1800W, Zorslesy Fast Heat Up Hand Clothing Garment Steamer, Portable Handheld Travel Fabric Steamer Plancha de Ropa a Vapor with 300ml Water Tank for Cleaning
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 3 mins
features: 【3 Levels Handheld Steamer - Removes Creases Efficiently, Safe on All Fabrics】This steamer has 3 sets to choose from. Safe to steam any fabric in all seasons from cotton, wool, silk, fiber etc. Wrinkle free and refresh everything from clothing to bedding and curtains. (Green light low set: suit for lighter clothes. Yellow light middle set: suit for moderate thickness coat. Red light high set: suit for winter coat or other thick fabrics.）

【1800W Powerful Steamer, Reheat In Only 30 Second】The steamer takes about 30 seconds to heat up with the help of 1800W heating power, enable steam to pass through easily through the cloth to thoroughly. Further the high temperature soleplate enhances the ironing effect and the 248-degree Fahrenheit steam can deep clean your clothes and also remove odors for a complete clean experience.

【Latest Electronic Pump System - No-Splling at Any Angle, Perfect Gift】- The latest electronic pump system ensure it won't leaking or spilling. You can use it at any angle, whaterever you to steam clothes placed horizontally or hung vertically. The high-quality clothing steamer will satisfy your family and friends, will be a perfect gift for family and friends.

【Stainless Steel Soleplate & Detachable Large Water Tank - Easy to Clean】 The detachable 300 ml water tank, support for about 15~25 minutes of continuous steaming, easy to use and clean. And the tpgraded smooth stainless steel panel make it not easy to deform, strong and durable.

【Portable and Compact Size Travel Steamer】- This clothing steamer has durable 70inches cable, hand-held and compact size design, is lightweight, easy to move and use. Perfect for business trips, vacations, destination weddings, or any other place where you'll need to smooth and de-wrinkle delicate clothing quickly, safely, and gently!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3 Levels Handheld Steamer - Removes Creases Efficiently, Safe on All Fabrics - This steamer has 3 sets to choose from. Safe to steam any fabric in all seasons from cotton, wool, silk, fiber etc. Wrinkle free and refresh everything from clothing to bedding and curtains. (Green light low set: suit for lighter clothes. Yellow light middle set: suit for moderate thickness coat. Red light high set: suit for winter coat or other thick fabrics.）1800W Powerful Steamer, Reheat In Only 30 Second - The steamer takes about 30 seconds to heat up with the help of 1800W heating power, enable steam to pass through easily through the cloth to thoroughly. Further the high temperature soleplate enhances the ironing effect and the 248-degree Fahrenheit steam can deep clean your clothes and also remove odors for a complete clean experience.Latest Electronic Pump System - No-Splling at Any Angle, Perfect Gift - The latest electronic pump system ensure it won't leaking or spilling. You can use it at any angle, whaterever you to steam clothes placed horizontally or hung vertically. The high-quality clothing steamer will satisfy your family and friends, will be a perfect gift for family and friends.Stainless Steel Soleplate & Detachable Large Water Tank - Easy to Clean - The detachable 300 ml water tank, support for about 15~25 minutes of continuous steaming, easy to use and clean. And the tpgraded smooth stainless steel panel make it not easy to deform, strong and durable.Portable and Compact Size Travel Steamer - This clothing steamer has durable 70inches cable, hand-held and compact size design, is lightweight, easy to move and use. Perfect for business trips, vacations, destination weddings, or any other place where you'll need to smooth and de-wrinkle delicate clothing quickly, safely, and gently!

No-Spilling & 30-second Preheat The handheld 1800W steamer heat-up in 30s,has upgrade no-spilling system, quickly and easily release wrinkles vertically or horizontally as an iron without leaking. Large Water Tank The large detachable 300ml water tank support give out a maximum spray volume of 25g/min about 25 minutes of continuous hot steaming. Lock Steam Switch With the lock switch, simple to lock the trigger for a continuous flow of steam. 3 Levels Handheld Steamer The steamer has 3 sets to choose from. Safe to steam any fabric in all seasons from cotton, wool, silk, fiber etc. Wrinkle free and refresh everything from clothing to bedding and curtains.

Package Include: Zorslesy 1800W Clothes Steamer * 1, Steamer Glove * 1, Brush * 1, Cup * 1 Knidly Reminder: Please read the manual carefully before usePlease do not touch the top of the garment steamer to avoid burnsThe voltage of this product is 110~120V, please do not use it directly in countries with a voltage exceeding 120V, such as the UK and Europe, as it will burn out the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works better than a more expensive brand I previously bought. Lightweight but solid enough to do a good job. Easy to use. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight. faster and easier to use than an iron
reviews.reviewText: I live in an RV where space and weight must be minimal. The Zorslesy steamer is lightweight and gentle on all fabrics. It does a great job and is very easy to use. Distilled water is cheap, so I leave the water behind when I move locations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Steamer / Does the job!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this steamer to take to my daughter's out of town wedding. We used it to steam multiple bridesmaid dresses as well as other clothing while on the trip. The dress fabric was a little think so we were a little concerned if it would do the job! It worked great steaming the dresses, heated up quickly and there was no "leaking" of water. It took out all the wrinkles that the dresses had. It was comfortable to handle and does not feel like some of the cheaper steamers I have used in the past. I used it to steam other outfits over the weekend and am using it a home now, as well! I would definitely recommend this clothes steamer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Steamer that really works-quickly!
reviews.reviewText: I've had many other steamers that have cost a lot more money, but have not done as good as job as this steamer. It heats up quickly and produces a great flow of steam quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought this steamer and have used it several times. It works perfectly. So happy I don’t have to use my iron anymore. This steamer is so easy to use. Great product for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works so good!
reviews.reviewText: It's lightweight and does a really good job steaming wrinkles out of clothes. I've owned a free standing steamer and this handheld model beats it easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I prefer steaming over ironing hands down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is so good, easy to use and it doesn’t drip water while using it like other steamers that I purchased before. The best steamer I ever bought.
